description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It imports necessary modules like React and ReactDOM, applies styles from 'index.css', and renders the main 'App' component within a strict mode wrapper, mounting it to the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components to the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree within the created root.
